title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing apples in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an apple in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq Red apples in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Red apples are among the richest and most substitute fruits ever and are more expensive than any other type of fruit, and seeing an apple, whether eating, buying, giving or taking from a person, all of these visions and symbols all indicate good news and happiness by the command of God Almighty, and seeing a red apple is a commendable dream when interpreted. Interpretation of seeing an apple in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Seeing an apple in a dream is a very beautiful and distinctive dream that carries many important meanings, because dreams have many meanings and signs, so we present to ourselves an elite group of Arab interpretation scholars and because dreams differ in interpretation as time passes, a person must be told about his vision as it is, so that he can reach a correct and accurate interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about an apple in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl dreams that she is buying an apple and then finds an apple that is not good and inedible, this is evidence of the presence of hypocrites in this girl’s life and she must be careful around her. In a dream, she sees that she is picking apples, this is evidence of success and success in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an apple in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is planting an apple tree, this is evidence of a change in the situation for the better. Interpretation of a dream about an apple in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is eating an apple and that it tastes delicious, this is a sign of an easy and natural birth and that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a dream about an apple in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman dreams that she is buying apples in large quantities and that the apples are not good, this is evidence that there are those who spoke badly about them and showed her how much they love them, so she should be careful. Those around her, and if a divorced woman dreams that she is eating an apple and it is green and delicious in taste, this is evidence that she will soon hear happy and happy news, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an apple in a man's dream If a man dreams that he is picking apples, this is evidence that the situation will change for the better soon, God willing, and if a man dreams that he is giving a green apple to a girl and she accepts the gift, this is evidence of that. Evidence of marriage or a relationship with a beautiful and kind girl with whom the seer lives a quiet and stable life, God knows best. A green apple in a dream Seeing a green apple in a dream indicates the purity of the seer's heart and the purity of any hatred and envy and indicates complete health, and eating a green apple means seeking knowledge or recovering from illness if he is sick and drinking its juice shows many livelihoods. As for seeing a yellow apple in a dream, it indicates illness, because the yellow color in a dream is an evil and hateful color not only in apples but in everything. Whoever sees him in a dream standing behind an apple, he will count money, that is, money. If in a dream there is a smell that he smells, he will get married, and if its smell is emitted in a meeting, he will gain fame if he eats it in a place he knows. If a person sees in a dream that he is eating an apple, an enemy will appear to him. As for the apple that is

title: Interpretation of ululations in a dream: Seeing the crescent moon in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of humiliation or zangrauta for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, engaged, married, or single young man, whether he is listening to the joy of a wedding party. Meanings of joy in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing howling in a dream indicates the return of the traveler if he is traveling, but if a person sees that he is happy and singing a lot in that joy, this means that a calamity will occur in the world. The near future. Some scholars see howling as an innovation, so it may indicate an innovation that the dreamer committed or denied, depending on the condition of the dreamer and the symbols of the vision. Seeing yourself screaming in a dream If a person sees in his dream that there is a group of loafers in his house, this means that his wife will give birth to a male child, if the number of these trills is three. He will walk the path of work, and if this young man is a student of knowledge, this indicates success and distinction. Screaming at home in a dream If one sees in a dream the spread of hymns in the house without any reason, this means that this person will walk the path of heresy, but if one sees in his dream that he is humming, this means that this person is committing heresy or something he wants to get rid of. Interpretation of hymns at a funeral If one sees in a dream a surprise at a funeral, this means that that person will change and get rid of worries and sorrows and turn for the better, or if the person sees the hunter in a state of great sadness, this indicates the loss of one of the people close to that person. Seeing her hovering in a single dream Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that surprises are spreading in her house, this means that she will get married soon if she is engaged, but if the girl is not engaged, this indicates the approach of her engagement. .Glorifying God in a married woman's dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a married woman in her dream hiding it indicates that this woman is shameful or indicates the presence of a group of people who speak ill of her in front of others, especially if she sees them screaming with joy. Interpretation of the groove in a pregnant woman's dream. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a boy if there is a lot of screaming in the dream. Seeing YouTube Tweets

title: Interpretation of touching in a dream by jinn and devils in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: To meet me, the interpretation of touch in a dream for different situations by Ibn Sirin: “The jinn” is a word that raises feelings of fear and tension in many people as soon as they hear it, and they are not reassured except when they seek refuge in God Almighty from the jinn and their evils that can greatly affect a person, and seeing them. In a dream or mentioning their names causes severe panic, so a person often searches for an interpretation of his visions, fearing that it will be bad for him. Interpretation of touch in a dream Today we show you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of jinn and demons touching people in detail from the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn touching a woman Single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman touching her jeans in a dream means that this girl receives a lot of envy, hatred, and feelings of jealousy from those around her. If an unmarried woman sees that there is a jinn touching her while reciting the Qur’an, this is evidence of the strength of her faith and good deeds, and God Almighty will give her abundant goodness in a short period. When an unmarried woman sees that the jinn is touching one of her family members, this indicates that there are some disputes between them, but they will disappear soon and end, God willing. If an unmarried woman sees that the jinn is touching her lover or someone she is emotionally attached to, and that the jinn spoke to her in his voice while he was inside that person, then Seeing it is a confirmation of the evil of that person. And deception and the desire to harm her, so she must beware of him and stay away from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a person being possessed by a jinn: Seeing a person shaking hands with jeans in a dream means that God Almighty will give him a lot of lawful money or that he will receive an important promotion at work. God knows best. Whoever dreams in a dream that jinn enter his body, his vision indicates that he is immersed in committing sins and seeking pleasures and far from the path of guidance and faith. The dreamer’s vision of the presence of jinn walking behind him indicates that there is a group of enemies waiting for him and planning to harm him in the near future. Therefore, God Almighty warned him to be careful and cautious. At this time not to exceed it. If one sees in a dream that there are individuals of the jinn standing around his house and in front of him, then his unpleasant vision warns him of an impending disaster or a big matter for him or it may be an indication that he will lose something important. In life. And if someone sees in a dream that two jinn entered his house and started talking to him, he and his house will be robbed because jinn always cause destruction and loss. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone wearing jeans. Seeing a person touched by jinn in a dream indicates the confusion and tension that the dreamer feels in the dream. This time, it is a sign of the turmoil in his practical and financial circumstances these days, which raises his great anxiety. This vision also indicates that this possessed person is deceiving the dreamer and manipulating him, so the dreamer must beware of him and stay away from bad friends who will only harm him in many ways. Sometimes this vision can indicate the annulment of the sin, failure to complete the marriage, or committing fraud, deception, theft, or what is wrong and deceiving people, knowing that the interpretation of the vision varies depending on the psychological, social, and material aspects. Case A

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled eggs for a single woman

preview.html: In the following lines, we will talk in detail about seeing eggs and learn together from our website, explaining all the signs and symbols of a dream with a boiled egg, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream for a single girl. Also, seeing eating boiled eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates Alleviate her circumstances. And fix many complex issues and solve supernatural matters in her life, and God knows best. If a girl always fails in exams, this vision heralds her success. Whoever is looking for a suitable job will find a good job, God willing. An unmarried woman suffers from bad luck in her love life. She always makes the mistake of choosing the right man, and soon the knight of her dreams will come to her, and God knows best. Boiled eggs in a dream symbolize the fulfillment of distant hopes. Reviving hope in impossible dreams that the girl thought would not come true, and God knows best. Everyone who missed a good opportunity in the past and regretted it. It is hard for her. We promise her a new opportunity that is better than before. She just has to trust God. If the girl feels wronged in the past or has been persecuted by an authority figure. God will grant her victory over those who wronged her and wronged her and will restore her rights soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation Watching boiled eggs in a dream for a married woman. Eating boiled eggs in a dream for a married woman indicates the expansion of the scope of the diet. Living a life of luxury, luxury, marital happiness and the abundance of male and female offspring. A woman who is late in giving birth portends seeing an imminent pregnancy and many offspring, God willing. Even a barren woman. She should be optimistic about this vision and trust in God's power. If the dreamer sees that her husband gave her a boiled egg in a dream. He does not forbid her anything and tries to please her in every way to stay by his side for the rest of his life. If the husband gives his wife in a dream a large and small egg and asks her to boil it It is a promising vision and indicates that the visionary is carrying twins. Eating rotten boiled eggs in a dream means worries and betrayal on the part of the children and the husband. Raw eggs in a dream, the gossip and sayings of women are worthless and worthless. It is said that the number of boiled eggs in a dream symbolizes To the number of children, if the dreamer eats them. The large eggs are male and the small ones are female, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a man eating boiled eggs in a dream and its meaning. A man ate a lot of boiled eggs in a dream. A sign of an increase in blessings in his life, the abundance of his livelihood, and the abundance of his offspring, God willing. Intentionally. The appearance of eggs in a dream is a sign of loss of blessings and lack of blessing in the diet, and God knows best. When a man sees in a dream, it is as if a stranger ate his egg. It is good news for the marriage of one of his daughters or sisters, and God knows best. Applying ghee on boiled eggs in a dream It is an abundance of sustenance and sustenance. Buying boiled eggs is a desire to have children, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about breaking eggs. The meaning of seeing boiled eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Eating boiled eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream. It expresses many blessings.

title: Interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream via the website vision roy2a.com Seeing strangers in a dream can make you feel suspicious, anxious, and confused about its meaning and what it represents, but on the contrary, this vision often has many good connotations, but interpreters differ. In the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the viewer, whether he is a man or a single woman, married or pregnant, and today through the Roya website, the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream will be discussed in detail based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream? Strangers in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing strangers in a dream indicates that there are things in the dreamer’s life that occupy his mind a lot and worry about them. Seeing strangers in a dream can indicate the loss that the viewer will suffer in his money. Seeing strangers in a dream indicates the presence of debts that burden the dreamer, Which makes him feel upset and resentful. Seeing strangers in a dream going to the mosque It indicates the emergence of positive things and the emergence of promising events in the life of the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of seeing a strange place in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream for a man: A man sees strangers in a dream It indicates what will happen He has a great status among people. A man sees strangers sitting with him in a dream. It shows that he will herald happy things that will come soon. A man sees strangers entering his house in a dream. It indicates many goods and foodstuffs coming to the dreamer in the coming season. A man seeing strangers in the same place indicates His great love for his family and his pursuit of their happiness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a house. What is the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream for a young man: A single young man seeing strangers in a dream indicates the success he will achieve in his work or indicates that he will get married soon. A young man sees strangers in his house in a dream. It indicates success And the great luck that will accompany him in his life. Seeing a young man accepting an invitation from strangers and enjoying it well may indicate that he will fight for the sake of God and the nation and be martyred, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone flying in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream for a single woman: Seeing strangers alone in a dream is It indicates how she feels about peace of mind, peace of mind, peace and stability in her life. Seeing strangers alone in a dream indicates goodness coming to her and success in achieving her desires and goals. Seeing women alone walking with strangers in a dream shows that she will soon marry a good man and will be very happy with him. Seeing lonely people and strangers chasing her in a dream indicates her anxiety, confusion, and inability to make a decision about something in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a repeated marriage to the same person in a dream Interpretation of seeing strangers in a dream for a married woman: Seeing married strangers in a dream indicates a stable life And the happy life she lives with her husband. Seeing married strangers in a dream may indicate her fear for her children and her concern for them.

title: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to the great interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream: Seeing a tiger in general is very similar to a dream about a lion, and a dream about a tiger shows a person with extreme hatred, authoritarianism, and treachery, and in different sites we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to the most famous commentators and in more detail. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about a tiger indicates a person A domineering villain and an apparent enemy, as the tiger is interpreted as an interpretation of a dream about a lioness and whoever sees that his head has turned into the head of an elephant, lion, or wolf. Then he conquers the enemies, and tiger milk is evidence of hostility. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing a tiger in a dream as an unjust ruler and a powerful enemy, and that whoever kills a tiger in a dream has killed his enemy, and whoever eats tiger meat in a dream will earn a lot of money. Money and great honor, and whoever sees a tiger riding on top, will suffer great harm, and whoever marries once, an unjust and corrupt master will rule. And whoever sees that a tiger has attacked his house, then a corrupt and unjust person will attack his house, and whoever sees that he has become a tiger in his dream, he will benefit from A corrupt and unjust person, and someone who is bitten by a tiger. His dream will cause damage the size of that bite, and whoever sees a tiger in his dream must ask forgiveness for his sins. The tiger also refers to a woman or a man, because the tiger changes color and has cunning and cunning, and indicates pain in the eyes or illness. The head, but if it is made of fur, this indicates that he is a rude man, and the milk of a tiger indicates the emergence of hostility towards him in the near future. The interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream is interpreted by a dream about a lion because it is more hostile than a lion, so whoever sees a tiger in his dream is fighting a man. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen. The interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream, according to Ibn Shaheen, indicates intense fear of the king or of a great enemy that cannot be defeated, or that the dreamer will earn a lot of money. And whoever sees that he is riding a tiger, this indicates his status. His high position and status, and that he defeated his enemy and seized power. Tiger meat in a dream indicates money and fame, and also indicates honor and fatigue. As for the tiger’s skin and hair in a dream, it indicates its greatness, which comes to it from the enemy’s money. Tiger milk in a dream is evidence of the enemy’s submission and also It indicates the appearance of a new enemy for the dreamer. And whoever sees that he is riding a tiger, he will defeat his enemy, defeat him, and take money from him. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream in the book of dream interpretations. A dream about tiger milk in a dream is evidence of the emergence of a new enmity, whether a person rode a tiger, fought with it, or suffered any harm. Of the tiger, its interpretation is towards the interpretation of a dream about a lion, a bear or all beasts. It denotes people whom we do not benefit from, an unjust king or many men. Fraud and deception. Perhaps a dream about a tiger indicates a corrupt and corrupt person, and eating tiger meat takes the dreamer out of leadership according to what he ate from this tiger also indicates that he will gain money and honor. Take damage from the ruler. Whoever is bitten by a tiger in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to material or physical damage to the extent that the tiger has harmed his body. The tiger can be a woman or a man, because the tiger changes color and has...

title: Interpretation of arresting a thief in a dream

preview.html: To meet me, the interpretation of arresting a thief in a dream is that theft is really sad. How hard it is for someone to break into your home and steal your stuff against your will. It is possible that the matter will turn into a murder when you see the thief, but in a dream the matter is definitely there. There is an interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream and arresting him as well, as it is considered one of the unpleasant visions, so today we will show you through our website an encyclopedia for the interpretation of arresting a thief in a dream, whether you . You are trying to enter the house or stealing something, as well as its interpretation for a single girl, so follow us. Interpretation of arresting a thief in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream is something that God cannot praise because he is taking away a right that is not his right, and Ibn Sirin believes that it may be something corrupt in morals or that there are conspiracies. On the monarch and. Cunning, and also if the thief is unknown, indicates the death of the wife, or a cursed illness. Interpretation of a thief who sees an unmarried woman in a dream. The interpretation of theft - as we mentioned - is undesirable, especially for unmarried women, as it is an indication of deception and evil, and schemes against her, and evidence When someone sees someone stealing something from her bag, this indicates that there is a woman who hates her very much and speaks badly about her. And when she sees a thief, this indicates that she will meet a young man who will hurt her a lot and then leave her alone later, which will cause her great psychological harm. And when she sees a thief In her house and steals him for his purposes and jewelry, God will bless her with a rich man with good intentions who will compensate her for what he stole from her in the dream. He can also be considered a thief in the dream that indicates the psychological crises that she is going through or delaying the age of marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a thief in the house and he did not steal anything When you see a thief stealing Something from the house, this indicates death or illness, as well as exposure to some plans or even theft in reality, but when you see the thief and he cannot steal, this indicates: escaping from the misfortunes that befell the visions at the last minute. If he is a merchant, he has lost many traits. But he miraculously survives it and is able to recover his money. If someone applies for a job, this indicates that he gets the job he is applying for. But if the student goes through some crises when taking the exam, he can pass this stage successfully. Interpretation of a dream about being arrested Criminal: When you see a policeman arresting someone you know to be a thief, this indicates that this person has fallen into a lot of trouble or been wronged by someone, as well as being involved in some family problems. Seeing a policeman in a dream is not a good thing, because it indicates distress, pain, and perhaps... Death, whether for the pioneer or for one of his relatives. Also, to see a thief being arrested in a dream is evidence that you are entering into a financial crisis. The vision varies according to the insight of one person to another, but if you see the thief trying to steal from the house and he does not succeed in the jewelry, this is a sign of... The marriage of one of the daughters of the house, and when food is stolen, it appears that their financial situation has improved, which affects the fortune-teller, or exposure to intrigue, as well as the possibility of the death of a relative, in addition to that it may indicate

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a white dove according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dove in a dream: A dream about a white dove is one of the most positive dreams. In fact, the white dove expresses peace and psychological comfort, which is not far from its meaning in a dream. Seeing it is good news for those who see that the future will be prosperous and free from causes of suffering and anxiety, and now we know the meaning and symbol of the white dove in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a white dove in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream of a white dove? Have you ever seen a white dove fluttering over your head when you sleep, inevitably if You saw such a dream, you are smiling with the utmost comfort and hoping to sleep a little longer to enjoy this vision, and this from a positive point of view brings seeing a white dove in a dream, as it appears more than one indicator listed below:If you are waiting for a message from a specific person or waiting for news Regarding your recent test result, seeing this white dove that has no other color is evidence of the happiness that you will feel after hearing this news coming to you. If you suffered a lot in the previous period and the earth crowded you with the many worries and problems it welcomed, then it is good for you that all The causes of worry and anxiety that you experienced in the past are gone. A new state of optimism and hope for the future begins. The white dove in the dream of a married man, to whom God has deprived him of the blessing of his successor, may indicate the extent of contentment he feels, and his belief that God (Glory be to Him) brings him a lot of goodness, and to him. Expect a reward from God. For a girl to see this dove, and to spend years without having the good husband she wants, this is a sign that her prayers have been answered, and the presence of a very suitable person for her who did not want better than him, and then she asks for her hand and marries her as soon as possible. Some scholars have said that seeing her lying on some eggs is a sign that the woman has given birth to a beautiful baby girl and a metaphor for her good morals, as a man marries a good wife and a woman has an ideal husband who takes care of her. And it protects her. What is the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream of a white dove? The Imam said that seeing it flying and fluttering around him in his bedroom is a sign of his marriage if he is single and his happiness with his wife if he is married. One can see that this beautiful pigeon has been slaughtered, and in this case the dream is A bad omen because it predicts that something will happen to the dreamer or those closest to his heart, especially if he is married, so he must take care of it. The woman belongs to him and stays by her side when she tells him that she needs him. But if he grilled her in a dream after slaughtering her, then there are many mistakes that he intentionally committed against his life partner, without paying attention to the feelings that he hurt, and he must take the initiative to apologize. She is satisfied with him and continued her life with him after what he did. You still do not find what you are looking for? Log in from Google to the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website and see everything that interests you. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of a white dove? Imam Ibn Sirin said that the white dove expresses optimism and hope for the future and the positives that affect the dreamer’s life after a state of intense sadness that will

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a blind woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream interpretation of seeing a blind woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is that worldly life is a place of sadness, in which a Muslim is exposed to many forms of sadness, as well as misfortunes, often followed by adversity. He received a great reward, and relief came to him by God’s command, and his transgressions and transgressions were erased. Among the forms of grief: that a person suffers from a hearing, visual, or physical disability, but what does this mean in a dream for you? Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blind woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a blind woman in A dream according to Ibn Sirin: A man or woman is called blind when he loses the sense of sight and is unable to see objects and objects, due to a defect or weakness in the eye, and this may be from birth, or the person. You may later suffer from an injury or defect in the vision process, and regardless of the reasons, we provide you with indicators. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a blind woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing a blind woman in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the deception to which she was exposed by those around her. And if she sees If an unmarried woman stays away from a blind person in a dream, this indicates her guidance and distance from bad behavior. Blindness in a person’s dream can be a sign that you will hear good news soon. He can be successful if he is in the study stage. Whereas if he is a graduate, he may The vision heralds a prestigious job or engagement soon. But for a married woman to see in a dream that she has lost her sight, this indicates a failure in worship or household duties. Perhaps it indicates the married woman’s inadequacy towards her husband and her bad behavior. Whereas if she sees that her husband has lost his sight, and she tries Helping him, the vision indicates her cooperation and support for her husband. As well as patience with life’s hardships, and standing by her husband in solving the problems and crises he faces. Seeing one of his children losing his sight indicates failure in exams or a problem in his life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman wearing White in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a blind woman in a single woman’s dream? The interpretation of any dream is only about knowing the social status of the dreamer and his gender, as well as whether or not there are problems or problems in his life, because of this role in the correct interpretation, so we will explain to you what is the interpretation of seeing a woman Blind in a dream for a single woman: Single people have been deceived by the people around them. The vision can be good news for the single woman. It indicates success and excellence in studies if she is a student. While if she is looking for a job, it is good for her that she will get a good job. It may The vision indicates a commitment in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the call to prayer or iqamah in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a blind person in a dream? Some may feel fear and anxiety when seeing a blind person in a dream, and the only way to ward off these fears is to search for the meaning of seeing a blind person in a dream. Dream: Seeing a blind person in a dream is a sign of bad luck. It also indicates evil in the dreamer’s life. In addition, it is an indication of many difficulties and obstacles that hinder the dreamer’s life. On the other hand, some may interpret it as...
